img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(18\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a0/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2818%29.png)
Once you've grabbed the Wisp, go in the opposite direction and past the Revenant Archer. On the other side of the underpass, you'll walk straight into another round of fighting. This time, you'll find the Revenants fighting Bull Sergeants.
img_below_text:
Before you go over to them, harvest the **Fire Bellflower** by the Buddha statue on the right. Then, go straight up and into the midst of the fighting, to find the Pale-Axe Stalwart taking on nearby Revenants. Alongside the fighting, the area is also being pelted with firebombs so having the Fireproof Mantle Vessel here can help you focus more on the fighting and less on the fire attacks.
### Boss Fight - Pale-Axe Stalwart

        - Following Text: "Before you go over to them, harvest the **Fire Bellflower** by the Buddha statue on the right. Then, go straight up and into the midst of the fighting, to find the Pale-Axe Stalwart taking on nearby Revenants. ### Boss Fight - Pale-Axe Stalwart"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a dark, atmospheric area in the game, featuring a pathway flanked by large Buddha statues and surrounded by desolate terrain. The red arrow indicates the direction the player should proceed, leading toward an upcoming combat encounter where Revenants are fighting Bull Sergeants. The red circle highlights the location of the **Fire Bellflower**, which the player is advised to harvest before engaging in the battle. This area also sets the stage for the subsequent boss fight against the Pale-Axe Stalwart.
